Subject: Question about SUPGs

From: Joshua Auerbach <joshua.auerbach@...>

Hi all,

I have a question about Single Unit Pattern Generators (SUPGs) as 
described in Morse et al, GECCO 2013.  I think that using CPPNs to paint 
a temporal pattern that can be used for robot locomotion is a really 
interesting idea, but am unclear about one point.

If I understood correctly, in that paper the triggering mechanism was 
hard-coded to be a touch sensor on the corresponding foot of the leg 
being actuated.  Is this correct?

Has any work been done on making this trigger evolveable so that it 
might work in more general settings?

Thanks!
Josh
